description.description:
DoggyFi brings Dogecoin functionality directly into your MetaMask wallet. With this Snap, you can interact with the Dogecoin blockchain seamlessly.

Features:

- Generate a single Dogecoin address derived from your MetaMask secret recovery phrase.
- Check the balance of your Dogecoin address.
- View the list of transactions associated with your address.
- Send DOGE from your address to another address.
- Send DRC-20 tokens from your address to another address.
- Send Dunes from your address to another address.
- Mint DRC-20 tokens.
- Mint transfer inscriptions for DRC-20 tokens.
- Deploy DRC-20 tokens to the network.
- Send Doginals to specified addresses.
- Inscribe Doginals onto the Dogecoin blockchain.
- Open Dunes by deploying open dune transactions.

How to Use:

1. Head to https://doggyfi.xyz/snap and connect your MetaMask wallet. You will be prompted to install the Snap.
2. Grant Permissions: When prompted, grant the required permissions to enable full functionality.
3. Interact with Dogecoin: Use your MetaMask wallet to interact with the Dogecoin network using the features listed above.

For more detailed information and tutorials, please visit the DoggyFi Snap README: https://github.com/DoggyFiOfficial/dogecoin-snap-public/blob/main/README.md.

For Developers:

- Utilize the exposed RPC API methods to build DApps or integrations that leverage Dogecoin within MetaMask: https://github.com/DoggyFiOfficial/dogecoin-snap-public/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#methods.
